article_title: Children reportedly among those killed in Gaza strikes overnight.
sentence: Children  reportedly  among  those  killed  in  Gaza  strikes  overnight.

article_title: Children reportedly among those killed in Gaza strikes overnight.
sentence: Israel  has  continued  its  heavy  bombardment  of  Gaza  overnight,  with  children  reported  to  have  been  among  those  killed  in  strikes  on  Khan  Younis  and  Rafah  in  the  south.
